title: Baahubali Gets Standing Ovation, PM Modi Meets Bollywood Stars And More From Entertainment
text:
1. Baahubali Becomes The First Non-English Film To Be Screened At Royal Albert Hall, Gets Standing Ovation In London

Baahubali: The Beginning was the first non-English film ever to be screened at Royal Albert Museum since its inauguration 148 years ago.

2. PM Modi Meets Film Stars To Mark Gandhi's 150th Birth Anniversary & People Are Not Sure Why

Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday hosted the members of film fraternity at his official residence,7, Lok Kalyan Marg, New Delhi. It was star-studded affair. From Shah Rukh Khan and Aamir Khan to Rajkumar Hirani and Kangana Ranaut, he interacted with the film fraternity and also discussed initiatives to mark the 150th anniversary of Mahatama Gandhi.

3. Hussain Kuwajerwala To Himanshi Khurana, 5 Celebs Who Might Join Bigg Boss 13 As Wild Card Entries

Meanwhile, it is said that the wild card entries will make their way to the show soon. In the coming few weeks, we might see new faces joining the show. The wildcard entries will sure change the equation between among the contestants.

4. Badshah Responds To Dr Zeus On 'Don't Be Shy' Controversy, Says He’s ‘Right To Get Angry With Me'

Don't Miss 208 SHARES 370 SHARES

"I am aware of the situation around Dont be shy’. I want to start by saying that i love And respect @drzeusworld paaji immensely and he knows it. He has the right to get angry with me because he’s my senior and ive learnt a lot from him. And he is the last person id want to go through something like this. I got on the song, which has been recreated by my dear friends Sachin Jigar, only after making sure we had the necessary rights. But still if there’s any misunderstanding, ill make sure it gets cleared asap. I support Zeus Paaji.”

5. Anushka Sharma Praises Sex Trafficking Survivor Sunitha Krishnan, Hails Her For Helping Victims

For the unversed, Sunitha Krishnan, the Padmashree awardee has been fighting sex trafficking. Sunitha has herself been a victim of alleged gang-rape by eight men when she was in her early teens. Her story even left Amitabh Bachchan speechless. She revealed the youngest child she saved from the crime was three-and-a-half-years old.
description: From Baahubali The Beginning becoming the first movie to be screening at Royal Albert Hall and getting a standing ovation to Prime Minister Narendra Modi meeting Bollywood stars and getting trolled for it, here is all that rocked the world of entertainment today.
